text:
- Hi, myself, Kuldeep Sengar,
Group CTO of Netcore Cloud.

Netcore Cloud serves over 6,500
brands across 40 countries,

and we offer an all-in-one
AI-powered customer experience

and personalization platform
that enables marketers
to create meaningful customer connections.

Netcore partnered with
AWS Enterprise Support
to accelerate the migration to AWS Cloud.
Our technical account manager

has been instrumental in
providing proactive guidance
and architectural reviews,

helping us to scale our
workloads efficiently
and optimize our costs.
The team's expertise has been important

in ensuring that our cloud
operations are highly secured,

fail-tolerant, and aligned
with our best practices.

Given the rapidly evolving
nature of generative AI,

the AWS Enterprise Support
team's ability to provide

in-depth, cutting-edge
guidance on market use cases
and the latest tools and techniques
was instrumental to expedite

Netcore Cloud's generative
AI strategy on AWS.
AWS Enterprise Support

has been a crucial component
of our cloud journey,

and we are looking forward
to expedite the partnership.
Thank you.
(upbeat music)
